name: @akosasante/trpc-types
description: Shared tRPC types for TradeMachine client and server

scripts.build: npm run build:server-types && npm run copy:server-types && npm run build:package && npm run fix:paths
scripts.copy:server-types: mkdir -p dist/server && cp -r ../../dist/api dist/server/ && cp -r ../../dist/DAO dist/server/ && cp -r ../../dist/bootstrap dist/server/ && cp -r ../../dist/models dist/server/ && cp -r ../../dist/utils dist/server/ && cp -r ../../dist/authentication dist/server/
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.publish:manual: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish

author: Akosua Asante
